Notes.Text:
This update for frr fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-46753: Fixed a crash caused from a crafted BGP UPDATE message. (bsc#1216626)
- CVE-2023-46752: Fixed a crash caused from a mishandled malformed MP_REACH_NLRI data. (bsc#1216627)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. It mishandles malformed MP_REACH_NLRI data, leading to a crash.

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occur for a crafted BGP UPDATE message without mandatory attributes, e.g., one with only an unknown transit attribute.
